markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nagaji Spell Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=3996) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 51</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Nagaji Spell Mysteries](/Feats.aspx?ID=3988)

</column>

---

Your magical skill rivals that of accomplished [naga](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=75) spellcasters. During your daily preparations, choose [_blink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=27), [_control water_](/Spells.aspx?ID=51), or [_subconscious suggestion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=314). You can Cast this Spell as a 5th-level occult innate spell once that day. You become an expert in occult spell DCs and occult spell attack rolls.
name: Nagaji Spell Expertise
